verbs.description: [ARG0: Justin Trudeau] [V: took] [ARG1: President Trump 's tweetstorm] [ARGM-MNR: in stride] -- [ARGM-MNR: literally] . [ARGM-PRD: Smiling and taking a walk with the Argentinian president Mauricio Macri and their wives] .
